bill.title: Direct the Legislative Research Commission to create the Task Force on Local Governments and Gun Violence to meet during the 2017 and 2018 interims; provide that the purpose of the task force is to study potential changes to Kentucky law that would allow local government control of firearms and ammunition while increasing public safety and reducing gun violence; set forth the membership of the task force; provide that a final report be submitted to the Legislative Research Commission by December 3, 2018.

history.action: to Veterans, Military Affairs, & Public Protection (S)
